WorkItem.Description:
Basic underline text in a paragraph is not transformed properly and results in a style with two attribute values:
 
style="text-decoration:none underline;"
 
My test document is attached.
WorkItem.Summary: Underlined text is not reansformed correctly

Comments.Message:
Hi Devinrader,
Can you clarify if this is happening with the C++ release build (in Releases tab) or with the C# code?
I could not regenerate this issue on firefox using the latest release. If this is an issue with C# code, we are currently not maintaining the .CS code. We will however make the necessary changes and upload the source by the end of the milestone release.

Regards,
Prashanth
